programme.title: Dream Turk En İyiler
programme.desc: Turk muziğinin en iyileri bu listede Dream Turk sayesinde sizlerle buluşuyor!

programme.title: Dance
programme.desc: Come and join the dance party! Get up and get moving with these three adorable characters as they dance around the screen to different songs and tunes. Dance is an excellent way to develop young viewers musical skills, the sense of rhythm and even their listening skills, setting them up for a bright future. And lets be honest, everyone loves to have a good dance.

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Learn how important water is to life on earth. This informative animation is something adults and children can enjoy together, while learning about animal habits and their habitats. Making the world of water come to life, help your child recognise and name animals to increase cognitive processes and strengthen memory. Submerge yourself in a world of fish and dont miss out.

programme.title: India
programme.desc: Want an adventure? Join an Indian boy and his elephant as they travel and explore their own country, visiting the market place and meeting new people! Designed for young audiences to experience various adventures, vibrant colours, smooth animation and music aids children to develop their thinking and observational skills, as well as stimulating their senses!

programme.title: Elf World
programme.desc: Two elves join together to explore Dreamworld, and they want you to come along, too! As with many of the Duck TV productions, there is also an educational purpose to this bright and engaging cartoon. This will enhance your childs creativity and encourage them to think creatively, while keeping them entertained throughout.

programme.title: Vehicles
programme.desc: In this bright, stimulating cartoon, young children can learn how many different modes of transport work. Not only will they widen their knowledge on transport, they will be entertained and engaged throughout. As is the case with many Duck TV productions, the aim is to entertain and educate. Children will also be encouraged to identify shapes and colours, essential for development.

programme.title: Beaver Family
programme.desc: This cartoon is designed for very young children. It shows the relationships of a beaver family, and how they go about their everyday lives. This programme has educational benefits, as long as serving to keep young children entertained. This programme is designed to enhance social skills, and develop child-parent relationships, too. It also promotes interaction between parent and baby.

programme.title: Sea Adventure
programme.desc: Gentle animation set to music. Sea Adventure follows the lives of two lively little fish who are growing up in their natural environment. This show can be used to help teach toddlers new vocabulary.

programme.title: Space Adventures
programme.desc: In this childrens cartoon that focuses on animals and other imagined creatures travelling through space, children are encouraged to think creatively, and widen their vocabulary. Duck TV produces content that aids child development, that is both entertaining and educational. Children are encouraged to name objects, improving language, and its very creative, encouraging imaginative thinking.

programme.title: Puffy and Tubby
programme.desc: Join best friends Puffy and Tubby, a couple of guinea pigs who are always hungry, as they embark on journeys around their environment in the search for more and more food. With a focus on developing social skills, identifying new objects and introducing your little ones to various new adventures, Puffy and Tubby excels at combining developmental lessons with endless fun.

programme.title: Animals
programme.desc: An educational show which teaches children everything they need to know about all sorts of animals, ranging from a familiar domestic cat or even the wildest of tigers found in the deepest of wildernesses. The programme explores how each and every one of these animals behaves, eats and plays and compares those characteristics to those us humans adopt.

programme.title: Puffy and Tubby
programme.desc: Join best friends Puffy and Tubby, a couple of guinea pigs who are always hungry, as they embark on journeys around their environment in the search for more and more food. With a focus on developing social skills, identifying new objects and introducing your little ones to various new adventures, Puffy and Tubby excels at combining developmental lessons with endless fun.

programme.title: We Are Playing Now
programme.desc: Educational childrens magazine exploring the world around us, including familiar people and objects through drawing and painting. It helps children develop cognitive skills, as well as parent-child emotional relations, introducing them to different situations.

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Learn how important water is to life on earth. This informative animation is something adults and children can enjoy together, while learning about animal habits and their habitats. Making the world of water come to life, help your child recognise and name animals to increase cognitive processes and strengthen memory. Submerge yourself in a world of fish and dont miss out.

programme.title: Mini Fairy Tales
programme.desc: Join the princess, the dragon, the fairies and the elves on their adventures in this mini-series of all your favourite fairy-tales. Designed with education and creativity, Mini Fairy Tales ensures to bring your childs imagination to life, encouraging parents to get involved and participate in telling stories your young ones! Come on an adventure and join in with the fairy-tale!

programme.title: Sunville
programme.desc: Follow the lives of the animal families of Sunville in these playful silent animated shorts. Encourage your child to join in with the narration of the stories to help them learn new words, identify objects and sounds, and develop their early social skills. Creatively develop your childs imagination as you discover what an average day looks like in their friendly little village.

programme.title: The World of Animals
programme.desc: This childrens cartoon is both educational and entertaining. Children will develop their knowledge on animals, so that they cannot only name animals, but they have a basic understanding of how and where they might live. Children can then apply this knowledge to their everyday lives, either in zoos, or even parks. As a result, children have greater respect for and interest in the environment.

programme.title: The Way We Travel
programme.desc: When viewing this cartoon, your child will watch various vehicles, which will, in turn, make them aware of a variety of different shapes and objects in the real world. They will also observe how they operate, which will allow them to grow an understanding of how they may be used in everyday life, as they see their different parts and hear the noises they make.

programme.title: Animals
programme.desc: An educational show which teaches children everything they need to know about all sorts of animals, ranging from a familiar domestic cat or even the wildest of tigers found in the deepest of wildernesses. The programme explores how each and every one of these animals behaves, eats and plays and compares those characteristics to those us humans adopt.

programme.title: We Are Playing Now
programme.desc: Educational childrens magazine exploring the world around us, including familiar people and objects through drawing and painting. It helps children develop cognitive skills, as well as parent-child emotional relations, introducing them to different situations.

programme.title: India

programme.title: Elf World
programme.desc: Two elves join together to explore Dreamworld, and they want you to come along, too! As with many of the Duck TV productions, there is also an educational purpose to this bright and engaging cartoon. This will enhance your childs creativity and encourage them to think creatively, while keeping them entertained throughout.

programme.title: Galaxy Tourists
programme.desc: Galaxy Tourists is out of this world. Following the stories of a trusty space-travelling rocket and his planet-discovering captain, this show is all about the friendship building expeditions and adventures of this space exploring pair. In classic Duck TV style this show stimulates the senses of its young audience and encourages creating thinking and imagination.

programme.title: Safari
programme.desc: Children can learn about the various wild and not-so wild animals from this well beautifully illustrated safari related programme. It goes on to explore each animals habitats within the environment it lives in but also studies their behaviour. This will provide children with a real insight into animals they already know and some that they may not and include facts that are not always provided.

programme.title: Whats Your Job?
programme.desc: "Whats Your Job" introduces younger audiences to various professions in society and combines education with enjoyment. When watching this series, parents are advised to talk about the jobs that are being shown so that they are able to learn why people do the profession that they do. Encouraging education and fun, this show introduces children to new words that they can learn but in a creative way.

programme.title: Sunville
programme.desc: Follow the lives of the animal families of Sunville in these playful silent animated shorts. Encourage your child to join in with the narration of the stories to help them learn new words, identify objects and sounds, and develop their early social skills. Creatively develop your childs imagination as you discover what an average day looks like in their friendly little village.

programme.title: Vege-tales
programme.desc: In Veggie-tales, childrens animated series, talking fruit and vegetable perform theatrical productions based on very kind stories. Main characters Bob the Tomato and Larry the Cucumber with the help of other vegetables are telling stories and teaching kids the basic human values, like honesty, thankfulness, kindness.

programme.title: Puffy and Tubby
programme.desc: Join best friends Puffy and Tubby, a couple of guinea pigs who are always hungry, as they embark on journeys around their environment in the search for more and more food. With a focus on developing social skills, identifying new objects and introducing your little ones to various new adventures, Puffy and Tubby excels at combining developmental lessons with endless fun.

programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. This show is enhanced with sufficient interaction with the children that its aimed at, for example the learning of older children is enhanced by asking them questions such as "whats different" between two or more objects. For younger children it is more beneficial to just point out these differences or similarities.

programme.title: Oli - The Cycles of Nature
programme.desc: Give your child a head start, in a way thats fun and exciting, too. Oli the elephant will teach your child to identify objects and their uses in everyday life, develop their thinking and observational skills, and also he will promote an interest in nature. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid the development of young children.

programme.title: Whats Your Job?
programme.desc: "Whats Your Job" introduces younger audiences to various professions in society and combines education with enjoyment. When watching this series, parents are advised to talk about the jobs that are being shown so that they are able to learn why people do the profession that they do. Encouraging education and fun, this show introduces children to new words that they can learn but in a creative way.

programme.title: City Life
programme.desc: Learn all about everyday life in the city. Come along as we meet the places, vehicles, people and animals that we find in our city. Walking around and talking to your child about what you are seeing is the best way for them to learn, but City Life is a great introduction for learning about different everyday places, developing social skills, and introducing toddlers to basic objects.

programme.title: Panni and Fanni
programme.desc: Panni and Fanni the two fairies draw their own versions of a sample picture to help toddlers to develop skills such as associating objects with their shapes and colours and stimulating imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Color Magic
programme.desc: Watch as happy smiley blobs of paint in red, green, blue and yellow, dance across the screen, colouring in the outlined picture as they go, transforming dull and lifeless pictures into colourful and vibrant masterpieces. Let your imagination run wild with this simple but fun colouring show whilst also developing your basic visual skills, stimulating colour and shape recognition and identification.

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. This enchanting display is accompanied by soothing music. This programme is not only designed to help children in learning the names of shapes, but it allows them to experience colours and music, too, nurturing your childs imagination.

programme.title: In the Museum
programme.desc: In a big museum full of beautiful art something peculiar keeps happening. Every now and then an animal disappears from the paintings. Can you help Mr.Clown as he journeys around the museum in search of his missing friends? In a great introduction to different types of art, In the Museum helps to reinforce shape recognition and improve young viewers ability to recognise and identify different animals.

programme.title: Space Adventures

programme.title: Safari
programme.desc: Children can learn about the various wild and not-so wild animals from this well beautifully illustrated safari related programme. It goes on to explore each animals habitats within the environment it lives in but also studies their behaviour. programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. This show is enhanced with sufficient interaction with the children that its aimed at, for example the learning of older children is enhanced by asking them questions such as "whats different" between two or more objects. For younger children it is more beneficial to just point out these differences or similarities.

They will also increase muscle strength and sense of balance, which will keep them healthy and happy!

programme.title: Hubbi and Friends
programme.desc: Hubbi and Friends are a group of handymen that embark on a series of exciting adventures on their travels through the countryside. They use their passion for fixing to fix everything that they find, even if it doesnt need fixing. The show teaches the incredibly important lesson that its okay to make mistakes, which promotes healthy interactions between parents and children.

programme.title: Hubbi Will Take Care of It
programme.desc: Hubbi hippo, Matti beaver and Milo and the ultimate DIY trio, no task is too great for this ferocious three. They are determined to fix everything, helping everyone they meet along the way. No job is too big for this group of friends. This cartoon is not only incredibly entertaining, but it promotes problem-solving, and encourages observational and cognitive skills within young children.

programme.title: Mimos World

This exciting new show puts a massive emphasis on the importance of friendship and teaches us all about different friendship values.

programme.title: In the Museum
programme.desc: In a big museum full of beautiful art something peculiar keeps happening. Every now and then an animal disappears from the paintings. Can you help Mr.Clown as he journeys around the museum in search of his missing friends? In a great introduction to different types of art, In the Museum helps to reinforce shape recognition and improve young viewers ability to recognise and identify different animals.

programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. This show is enhanced with sufficient interaction with the children that its aimed at, for example the learning of older children is enhanced by asking them questions such as "whats different" between two or more objects. For younger children it is more beneficial to just point out these differences or similarities.

programme.title: Dinoland
programme.desc: Go on adventures with four adorable baby dinosaurs as they explore their environment and work together to solve tricky problems. Helping young viewers to develop their initial problem solving and decision making skills as well as developing their social skills makes Dinoland the perfect combination of fun and learning. Make the most of these educational lessons with dinosaur puppets or soft toys.

programme.title: My Pet Family
programme.desc: Pets are part of the family! In My Pet Family, the preschooler Tony shows us how much joy, love and responsibility comes with owning pets.

programme.title: The Shapies
programme.desc: The Shapies are here to show younger audiences to the world of shapes on fun adventures! Showing us where they fit in and what they resemble, The Shapies will enable toddlers to recognise shapes!

programme.title: Sounds Around Us
programme.desc: Join elf twins Liza and Ben to learn more about sounds, how to find them and how to recreate them. Follow them as they whizz away on exciting adventures together to investigate where different familiar sounds are coming from. Play along with the twins and encourage your child to listen and identify the sounds you hear together. Can you work out the source before the twins do?

programme.title: Lola and the Numbers
programme.desc: Lola and the Numbers makes counting fun for its littlest viewers. Lola is a playful young girl who helps us to identify different numbers, count from one to ten and develop our pre-math skills. The most important viewing tips for parents and little ones is that we always count with Lola! whether its in English or your own language, counting aling is always fun!

programme.title: Pixie 2
programme.desc: Join Lilali, an elf magician. who just loves to perform his magic tricks. This programme, for very young viewers, can help little ones learn basic vocabulary. Watch with children and repeat the words of the objects on the screen to teach them short, simple words. After you have watched the programme you can repeat the vocabulary from the programme whilst playing to reinforce the words learnt.

programme.title: Ducky and Friends
programme.desc: Childrens programme that follows the amazing adventures of a lovable little duck named Ducky, and a variety of her friends. programme.title: Albert Explains

Africa introduces its young viewers to a wider range of animals, including some lesser known ones that they probably havent heard of before, a great way for children to develop their cognitive and observational skills.

programme.title: Nature Dudes
programme.desc: Nature Dudes is a fun cartoon that helps its young viewers to learn about all things natural. They focus on teaching about identifying different animals, learning about their different habits and habitats. They also put a focus on seasons and the weather, helping its little viewers learn about rain and sunshine, in a fun and exciting way.

programme.title: Get Up!
programme.desc: Duck TV fitness instructors will get you up on your feet and moving. The exercises propel childrens coordination and motoring skills, essential to child development.

programme.title: Raul
programme.desc: Raul and Birdie are best friends. Raul is an adorable green hippopotamus who loves to go on exciting adventures and Birdie is his side kick. These two lovable characters find themselves in all sort of situations as they journey around the countryside, but with each others help they will always find their way out of any problem.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo
programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. Through this show, it will teach your child about developing social skills, teach them the values of friendship and join Mimo and Bobo on their adventures and experience them together! Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.title: Tempo Giusto
programme.desc: Learning about time can be hard, but Tempo Giusto makes it so much fun. Go on an adventure with Henry and Lola as they introduce you to the basics concepts of time, help you develop your pre-math skills and teach you about the sequencing of events. Lola uses her love of numbers to tell the time whilst Henry uses his amazing storytelling skills to show us what kids get up to at different times of the day.

programme.title: Happy Garden

programme.title: DuckSchool

There might even be some special guests to meet along the way.

programme.title: ABC - duckBC
programme.desc: Writing skills introduced, explained and developed through the animated adventures of the five stalwarts of the art of penmanship: Pen, Pencil, Stamp, Eraser and Brush. programme.title: The Shapies

programme.title: Henrys Stories

programme.title: Shaping Up
programme.desc: Join Shaping Up as the happy and smiling geometric shapes introduce shapes to younger audiences and combine to create various objects that children will recognise from their everyday world. programme.title: Monica and Rudy 2

programme.title: Pixie 2

After you have watched the programme you can repeat the vocabulary from the programme whilst playing to reinforce the words learnt.

programme.title: Little Melodies
programme.desc: This show encourages creativity, as you learn lots of fun new songs. This skill can be extended to everyday life; sing these songs at bedtime, in the car, on a walk, whenever! This sharpens the sense of hearing and nurtures any musical skills, aiding child development. This is a Duck TV production. Duck TV aim to produce content that is both educational and entertaining.

programme.title: Happy Meadow
programme.desc: Two happy rabbits, Sari and Nati have lots of fun playing in Happy Meadow, in this childrens cartoon. They have plenty of other lovable friends who also live in Happy Meadow with them. Children are encouraged to grow their vocabulary and recognise colours.

programme.title: Dotty, the Kitty
programme.desc: Get creative with Dotty the Kitty and follow the dotted line left by the pencil to try and create a masterpiece. Uncover the final painting and unlock the imagination of your child all at the same time. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

Ducky Adventures has been designed to help your child develop their observational skills whilst also letting them use their imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Happy Meadow
programme.desc: Two happy rabbits, Sari and Nati have lots of fun playing in Happy Meadow, in this childrens cartoon. They have plenty of other lovable friends who also live in Happy Meadow with them. Duck TV aim to produce content for young children that is educating, and aids their development, while being entertaining at the same time. Children are encouraged to grow their vocabulary and recognise colours.

programme.title: Fireteam
programme.desc: Hop on board the bright red fire truck and follow the three little firemen as they get to work keeping their village safe. Encourage your child to develop their ability to problem solve and improve their decision-making skills by identifying hazards and solutions together.

programme.title: Ducky and Friends
programme.desc: Childrens programme that follows the amazing adventures of a lovable little duck named Ducky, and a variety of her friends. programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. Africa introduces its young viewers to a wider range of animals, including some lesser known ones that they probably havent heard of before, a great way for children to develop their cognitive and observational skills.

programme.title: Small - But Hardworking
programme.desc: Three elves build a variety of different objects with materials such as wood and ice. This show is designed to be both educational and entertaining. It advances childrens imagination, by stimulating their senses with a bright colourful cartoon. Objects coming to life also enhances the focus on promoting creative imagination. This programme also aids children in beginning to recognise shapes.

programme.title: Hipp-hopp Cactus
programme.desc: Join three houseplants and a busy little bee as they learn more about the objects, shapes and colours they find around their home. Once theyre sure no one is around, the trio of plants come to life and identify where to find them and how to use them properly. Learn up to 20 new words a day as your child has fun labelling the objects they see while searching for them in your own home.

programme.title: We Are Playing Now

programme.title: City Life
programme.desc: Learn all about everyday life in the city. Come along as we meet the places, vehicles, people and animals that we find in our city. Walking around and talking to your child about what you are seeing is the best way for them to learn, but City Life is a great introduction for learning about different everyday places, developing social skills, and introducing toddlers to basic objects.

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. This enchanting display is accompanied by soothing music. This programme is not only designed to help children in learning the names of shapes, but it allows them to experience colours and music, too, nurturing your childs imagination.

programme.title: Partners in Fun
programme.desc: Go on countless adventures and mess around with this adorable duo. Join a baby monkey and bear-cub as they play around, making friends and having fun. Get your little one to interact with the show by identifying colours as they come onto the screen for extra learning.

programme.title: Leon-ART
programme.desc: Join the painter bear as he draws and paints friends for himself to play with. What are his painted friends today? The series is a perfect bedtime story to relax before going to bed. programme.title: Color Clara
programme.desc: Clara is an extraordinary, extra colourful, chameleon girl. Deep in the jungle in her cosy chameleon house, Clara uses her colour changing powers for good by helping her wrongly coloured jungles friends and objects to return to their natural colour. This exciting jungle tale helps young viewers to connect objects to their usual colours, developing their basic visual skills..

programme.title: Henrys Stories
programme.desc: Henry loves telling stories, but he needs your help to make sure its all in the correct order. Follow Henry in these silent animated shorts as he constructs stories with the help of his handy picture cards. Teach your children about logical thinking and deductive reasoning as you narrate the sequences together and solve his picture puzzles to see the story come to life.

programme.title: My Pet Family
programme.desc: Pets are part of the family! In My Pet Family, the preschooler Tony shows us how much joy, love and responsibility comes with owning pets.

programme.title: The Shapies
programme.desc: The Shapies are here to show younger audiences to the world of shapes on fun adventures! Showing us where they fit in and what they resemble, The Shapies will enable toddlers to recognise shapes!

programme.title: Shaping Up
programme.desc: Join Shaping Up as the happy and smiling geometric shapes introduce shapes to younger audiences and combine to create various objects that children will recognise from their everyday world. programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. This show is enhanced with sufficient interaction with the children that its aimed at, for example the learning of older children is enhanced by asking them questions such as "whats different" between two or more objects. For younger children it is more beneficial to just point out these differences or similarities.

When watching this series, parents are advised to talk about the jobs that are being shown so that they are able to learn why people do the profession that they do. Encouraging education and fun, this show introduces children to new words that they can learn but in a creative way.

programme.title: Panni and Fanni
programme.desc: Panni and Fanni the two fairies draw their own versions of a sample picture to help toddlers to develop skills such as associating objects with their shapes and colours and stimulating imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. This enchanting display is accompanied by soothing music. This programme is not only designed to help children in learning the names of shapes, but it allows them to experience colours and music, too, nurturing your childs imagination.

programme.title: Miyu and Litto
programme.desc: Miyu and Litto want you to come on their latest adventure! This is a Duck TV production, designed to both entertain and educate young children. Problem solving and decision making are key to the success of their adventures, along with their trusty colour wheel, too. Will you be able to apply skills of logic and reasoning to help Miyu and Litto in their adventures?

programme.title: Color Magic
programme.desc: Watch as happy smiley blobs of paint in red, green, blue and yellow, dance across the screen, colouring in the outlined picture as they go, transforming dull and lifeless pictures into colourful and vibrant masterpieces. Let your imagination run wild with this simple but fun colouring show whilst also developing your basic visual skills, stimulating colour and shape recognition and identification.

programme.title: Whats Your Job?
programme.desc: "Whats Your Job" introduces younger audiences to various professions in society and combines education with enjoyment. When watching this series, parents are advised to talk about the jobs that are being shown so that they are able to learn why people do the profession that they do. Encouraging education and fun, this show introduces children to new words that they can learn but in a creative way.

programme.title: In the Museum
programme.desc: In a big museum full of beautiful art something peculiar keeps happening. Every now and then an animal disappears from the paintings. Can you help Mr.Clown as he journeys around the museum in search of his missing friends? In a great introduction to different types of art, In the Museum helps to reinforce shape recognition and improve young viewers ability to recognise and identify different animals.

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. This enchanting display is accompanied by soothing music. This programme is not only designed to help children in learning the names of shapes, but it allows them to experience colours and music, too, nurturing your childs imagination.

programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. This show is enhanced with sufficient interaction with the children that its aimed at, for example the learning of older children is enhanced by asking them questions such as "whats different" between two or more objects. For younger children it is more beneficial to just point out these differences or similarities.

programme.title: Listen to This
programme.desc: This fun and colourful cartoon will keep your kids entertained, and also teach them a couple of creative skills on the way, through encouraging young children to pair sounds to animals and musical instruments. The programme will introduce key musical instruments, and improve sound recognition. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid child development.

programme.title: Happy Kingdom
programme.desc: Catching up with the adorable bunnies from Happy Meadows, Happy Kingdom introduces lots more fun characters such like a fearless-knight hedgehog and a caring cook-squirrel. Reinforcing the young viewers knowledge of different animals and developing their vocabulary in a new and fun way, Happy Kingdom is just as educational as it is exciting. Why not get involved and host an animal toy party whilst you watch.

programme.title: Ristorante
programme.desc: Welcome to the Ristorante, come in and find out how the restaurant works. Learn about all the different processes starting with the preparation and moving to the baking or the cooking, the serving and finally to the dish washing. Encourage your little ones to play pretend, cooking up some imaginary treats for you, your friends and family. Learn some new vocabulary, stimulate your senses and having fun.

programme.title: Happy Meadow
programme.desc: Two happy rabbits, Sari and Nati have lots of fun playing in Happy Meadow, in this childrens cartoon. They have plenty of other lovable friends who also live in Happy Meadow with them. Duck TV aim to produce content for young children that is educating, and aids their development, while being entertaining at the same time. Children are encouraged to grow their vocabulary and recognise colours.

programme.title: Connected World
programme.desc: Join the children in this friendly multicultural day-care centre and learn about the diverse heritages of each of the toddlers. Learn where each of the pupils are from and even try to guess their nationalities from their clothing, favourite landmarks and special foods. Help them to narrate the stories and encourage them to be curious about new cultures, languages and countries.

programme.title: Ducky Adventures
programme.desc: Every day is a different adventure for Ducky! This animated show lets toddlers and pre-schoolers to join Ducky to learn through daily activities. This series is brought to you by DuckTV, which works with child psychologists in creating programmes for babies and toddlers. Ducky Adventures has been designed to help your child develop their observational skills whilst also letting them use their imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Finn and Fianna
programme.desc: Finn and Fianna, the two little elves, are studying their environment and discovering their environment with a lot of curiousity! Getting to know their surroundings and the basic attributes that exist within it, join Finn and Fianna as they use their senses of seeing, tasting, feeling and discovering to develop your little ones thinking skills as well as what they see!

programme.title: Mimos World
programme.desc: Join some of our favourite Duck TV characters as they embark on lots of new adventures. Our little panda bear Mimo and his best friend Bobo from "Didy Baby" and "Mimo and Bobo" journey around Mimos world meeting new friends and having fun. This exciting new show puts a massive emphasis on the importance of friendship and teaches us all about different friendship values.

programme.title: My Toys - My Friends
programme.desc: Go on adventures with this adorable teddy bear and all of his toy friends. My Toys My Friends helps young viewers to understand the categorisation of objects, promotes creativity and helps to develop social skills.

programme.title: Partners in Fun
programme.desc: Go on countless adventures and mess around with this adorable duo. Join a baby monkey and bear-cub as they play around, making friends and having fun. Young viewers can develop their social skills and learn about the value of friendship whilst experiencing lots of different adventures. Get your little one to interact with the show by identifying colours as they come onto the screen for extra learning.

programme.title: We Are Playing Now
programme.desc: Educational childrens magazine exploring the world around us, including familiar people and objects through drawing and painting. It helps children develop cognitive skills, as well as parent-child emotional relations, introducing them to different situations.

programme.title: The World of Animals
programme.desc: This childrens cartoon is both educational and entertaining. Children will develop their knowledge on animals, so that they cannot only name animals, but they have a basic understanding of how and where they might live. Children can then apply this knowledge to their everyday lives, either in zoos, or even parks. As a result, children have greater respect for and interest in the environment.

programme.title: Puffy and Tubby
programme.desc: Join best friends Puffy and Tubby, a couple of guinea pigs who are always hungry, as they embark on journeys around their environment in the search for more and more food. With a focus on developing social skills, identifying new objects and introducing your little ones to various new adventures, Puffy and Tubby excels at combining developmental lessons with endless fun.

programme.title: Shaping Up
programme.desc: Join Shaping Up as the happy and smiling geometric shapes introduce shapes to younger audiences and combine to create various objects that children will recognise from their everyday world. programme.title: Higher the Better

programme.title: Color Clara
programme.desc: Clara is an extraordinary, extra colourful, chameleon girl. Deep in the jungle in her cosy chameleon house, Clara uses her colour changing powers for good by helping her wrongly coloured jungles friends and objects to return to their natural colour. This exciting jungle tale helps young viewers to connect objects to their usual colours, developing their basic visual skills..

programme.title: Tempo Giusto

Lola uses her love of numbers to tell the time whilst Henry uses his amazing storytelling skills to show us what kids get up to at different times of the day.

programme.title: The Shapies

programme.title: Lola and the Numbers
programme.desc: Lola and the Numbers makes counting fun for its littlest viewers. Lola is a playful young girl who helps us to identify different numbers, count from one to ten and develop our pre-math skills. programme.title: Sippi Sappi

programme.title: Dotty, the Kitty

programme.title: Henrys Stories
programme.desc: Henry loves telling stories, but he needs your help to make sure its all in the correct order. Follow Henry in these silent animated shorts as he constructs stories with the help of his handy picture cards. Teach your children about logical thinking and deductive reasoning as you narrate the sequences together and solve his picture puzzles to see the story come to life.

programme.title: Ducky and Fluffy

programme.title: Shaping Up

Duck TV aims to produce content thats both entertaining and informative, so that children may learn new skills in a fun and creative way. In this particular skills, the Professor helps children develop their cognotive skills, so that they can grow up to be as clever as him.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo
programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. Through this show, it will teach your child about developing social skills, teach them the values of friendship and join Mimo and Bobo on their adventures and experience them together! Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.title: Monica and Rudy
programme.desc: Monica and Rudy is a colorful animated series on Duck TV intended for the youngest viewers. Monica is a little girl who has a pet- a parrot named Rudy. Monica takes Rudy out of the cage and together they go on their little adventures- in the forest, in the park, or to the pond where they meet different animals and birds. Monica teaches Rudy to imitate the sounds made by the animals.

programme.title: The Shapies
programme.desc: The Shapies are here to show younger audiences to the world of shapes on fun adventures! Showing us where they fit in and what they resemble, The Shapies will enable toddlers to recognise shapes!

programme.title: Pixie 2
programme.desc: Join Lilali, an elf magician. who just loves to perform his magic tricks. This programme, for very young viewers, can help little ones learn basic vocabulary. Watch with children and repeat the words of the objects on the screen to teach them short, simple words. After you have watched the programme you can repeat the vocabulary from the programme whilst playing to reinforce the words learnt.

programme.title: Finn and Fianna
programme.desc: Finn and Fianna, the two little elves, are studying their environment and discovering their environment with a lot of curiousity! Getting to know their surroundings and the basic attributes that exist within it, join Finn and Fianna as they use their senses of seeing, tasting, feeling and discovering to develop your little ones thinking skills as well as what they see!

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: As is the case with many Duck TV programmes, this programme is designed to both educate and entertain its young audience. This cartoon takes a look into the lives of a range of the cutest baby animals, and explores their family relationships. The cartoon develops social skills and understanding family relationships, alongside improving the ability to recognise different animals, too.

programme.title: Happy Meadow
programme.desc: Two happy rabbits, Sari and Nati have lots of fun playing in Happy Meadow, in this childrens cartoon. They have plenty of other lovable friends who also live in Happy Meadow with them. Duck TV aim to produce content for young children that is educating, and aids their development, while being entertaining at the same time. Children are encouraged to grow their vocabulary and recognise colours.

programme.title: The Shapies
programme.desc: The Shapies are here to show younger audiences to the world of shapes on fun adventures! Showing us where they fit in and what they resemble, The Shapies will enable toddlers to recognise shapes!

programme.title: Sippi Sappi
programme.desc: Sippi Sappi is an educational show about a couple of friends who love rollerskating around whilst on holiday in the countryside. The programme aims to encourage its young viewers to engage in sporting activites, encourage creative thinking and relate to other childrens adventures. Aired on Duck TV Sippi Sappi is an all round fun way to get your little ones active and excited about sport.

programme.title: Shaping Up
programme.desc: Join Shaping Up as the happy and smiling geometric shapes introduce shapes to younger audiences and combine to create various objects that children will recognise from their everyday world. Developing babies proper shape-recognition from using vibrant colours a smooth transitions, Shaping Up combines educative aspects so that babies are able to develop their image recognition and creative skills.

programme.title: Sounds Around Us
programme.desc: Join elf twins Liza and Ben to learn more about sounds, how to find them and how to recreate them. Follow them as they whizz away on exciting adventures together to investigate where different familiar sounds are coming from. Play along with the twins and encourage your child to listen and identify the sounds you hear together. Can you work out the source before the twins do?

programme.title: Zack and Ziggy
programme.desc: Meet a little geek boy named Zack and his best friend, a dog named Ziggy as they help children learn the concept of size through funny adventures, laughter and games. Join them as they make size based line ups, groups, and comparisons, having lots of fun along the way.

programme.title: Ducky and Friends
programme.desc: Childrens programme that follows the amazing adventures of a lovable little duck named Ducky, and a variety of her friends. By watching their escapades, young viewers will have lots of fun, and they will also have a chance to learn about friendship, sharing, and playing nicely with friends.

programme.title: Risto Gusto
programme.desc: Basil, Yam and Oregano have their own restaurant and are always happy to treat their little friends to healthy food and drinks. Its fun for everyone to have a good meal, walk around the park and explore the world around them. Th cartoon stimulates childrens imagination and creativity, and it also has got tranquil sweet tunes that follow every adventure.

programme.title: Mimos World
programme.desc: Join some of our favourite Duck TV characters as they embark on lots of new adventures. Our little panda bear Mimo and his best friend Bobo from "Didy Baby" and "Mimo and Bobo" journey around Mimos world meeting new friends and having fun. This exciting new show puts a massive emphasis on the importance of friendship and teaches us all about different friendship values.

programme.title: Henrys Stories
programme.desc: Henry loves telling stories, but he needs your help to make sure its all in the correct order. Follow Henry in these silent animated shorts as he constructs stories with the help of his handy picture cards. Teach your children about logical thinking and deductive reasoning as you narrate the sequences together and solve his picture puzzles to see the story come to life.

programme.title: Hop-hop
programme.desc: Hop-hop is a cartoon for the littlest viewers of 6 to 36 months old and their families. Its engaging and educational content together with peaceful music and colorful catching picture is very entertaining. Cute Bunnies do everything together- play, eat, brush their teeth, walk, run, swim, have fun.

programme.title: Cucu, Im here!
programme.desc: Have some fun with the Cucus as they play hide and seek. Cucu, Im here! follows the cucus as they go on lots of adventures, playing games and laughing all day! What better way to improve young viewers cognitive skills, introducing them to object permanence and developing their thinking skills. Cucu, Im here! is the perfect way to have some fun whilst learning something new.

programme.desc: Hubbi and Friends are a group of handymen that embark on a series of exciting adventures on their travels through the countryside. They use their passion for fixing to fix everything that they find, even if it doesnt need fixing. The show teaches the incredibly important lesson that its okay to make mistakes, which promotes healthy interactions between parents and children.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo PLUS
programme.desc: Join the two familiar characters who have become preschoolers but still love fun adventures which teach them about various useful things. programme.title: Tempo Giusto
programme.desc: Learning about time can be hard, but Tempo Giusto makes it so much fun. Go on an adventure with Henry and Lola as they introduce you to the basics concepts of time, help you develop your pre-math skills and teach you about the sequencing of events. Lola uses her love of numbers to tell the time whilst Henry uses his amazing storytelling skills to show us what kids get up to at different times of the day.

programme.title: Sunville - Sportsville
programme.desc: Mister Goat, the Raccoon Family, Kitty Cat and the Friendly Pig are participating in Sports Day, and they want you to come along and join the fun! In doing so, not only will your child have lots of fun, but they will be exercising and developing basic coordination skills along the way. They will also increase muscle strength and sense of balance, which will keep them healthy and happy!

programme.title: Zoo
programme.desc: One friendly zoo keeper wants you to come along and meet all the exciting animals hes looking after, and learn a few things on the way, too! This cartoon for young children, encourages them to recognise and name a variety of animals, acquire basic vocabulary, and associate the sounds animals with the sounds that they make.

programme.title: Ducky Adventures
programme.desc: Every day is a different adventure for Ducky! This animated show lets toddlers and pre-schoolers to join Ducky to learn through daily activities. This series is brought to you by DuckTV, which works with child psychologists in creating programmes for babies and toddlers. Ducky Adventures has been designed to help your child develop their observational skills whilst also letting them use their imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Happy Kingdom
programme.desc: Catching up with the adorable bunnies from Happy Meadows, Happy Kingdom introduces lots more fun characters such like a fearless-knight hedgehog and a caring cook-squirrel. Reinforcing the young viewers knowledge of different animals and developing their vocabulary in a new and fun way, Happy Kingdom is just as educational as it is exciting. Why not get involved and host an animal toy party whilst you watch.

programme.title: Cubie
programme.desc: Animated childrens series following Cubie the builder who has fantastic plans for new buildings. Cubie loves to build and, with help from his friends, the cheerful cubes, erects inventive new constructions. This enjoyable series from Duck TV helps children build their spatial awareness and observational skills while learning about new prepositions and the basics of building.

This programme also aids children in beginning to recognise shapes.

programme.desc: Get creative with Dotty the Kitty and follow the dotted line left by the pencil to try and create a masterpiece. Uncover the final painting and unlock the imagination of your child all at the same time. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

programme.title: Doll Team to the Rescue
programme.desc: Bell and her trusty friends Fido the Kangaroo and Lilo the Bear come to the rescue in the forest for anybody that needs it! Doll Team to the Rescue teaches the importance of social skills, friendship and treating animals with love and respect.

Encouraging education and fun, this show introduces children to new words that they can learn but in a creative way.

programme.title: Listen to This
programme.desc: This fun and colourful cartoon will keep your kids entertained, and also teach them a couple of creative skills on the way, through encouraging young children to pair sounds to animals and musical instruments. The programme will introduce key musical instruments, and improve sound recognition. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid child development.

programme.title: Vege-tales
programme.desc: In Veggie-tales, childrens animated series, talking fruit and vegetable perform theatrical productions based on very kind stories. Main characters Bob the Tomato and Larry the Cucumber with the help of other vegetables are telling stories and teaching kids the basic human values, like honesty, thankfulness, kindness.

programme.title: City Life
programme.desc: Learn all about everyday life in the city. Come along as we meet the places, vehicles, people and animals that we find in our city. Walking around and talking to your child about what you are seeing is the best way for them to learn, but City Life is a great introduction for learning about different everyday places, developing social skills, and introducing toddlers to basic objects.

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. This enchanting display is accompanied by soothing music. This programme is not only designed to help children in learning the names of shapes, but it allows them to experience colours and music, too, nurturing your childs imagination.

programme.title: Colorwheel
programme.desc: One brave little pup is determined to find his friend, who is lost in the forest. He uses his trusty colour wheel to navigate his way, using skills of reasoning and logic. This programme is a Duck TV production, that intends to educate its audience, alongside entertaining them. In this series, children will develop skills such as problem solving, decision making, and also knowledge around colour.

programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. programme.title: Gun Sonu

Find out whats going on in the world of economy, politics, culture, sport, medicine, ecology. Focus has it all covered for you.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: Watch the latest international top stories, The News every 30 minutes with the emphasis on debate, dialogue, role of cultural differences, analytics of key events all over the world, comments, hot topics of the day, reports.

programme.title: The Debate
programme.desc: Live debate show on the key topic of the day with four guests from different spots of the globe, from Monday to Thursday. Keep up with up-to-date issues from all over the world in politics, culture, sports, economy and healthcare. Get the latest facts and expert opinions about the most essential stories happening around us and draw your own conclusions.

programme.title: High Potential
programme.desc: Olağanustu zeki bir bekâr anne Los Angeles Emniyetinin Buyuk Suçlar birimine kabul edilir ve suçları çozmedeki sıra dışı becerisi sayesinde, kurallara uyan emektar bir dedektifle alışılmadık ve engel tanımaz bir ortaklık kurar.

programme.title: White Collar
programme.desc: Çekici dolandırıcı Neal Caffrey hapishaneden kaçar, ancak duşmanı FBI Ajanı Peter Burke tarafından yeniden yakalanır. Birkaç seçeneğe sahip olan Caffrey, nihai ozgurluğu karşılığında buronun diğer yakalanması zor suçluları alt etmesine yardım eder. Ancak çok geçmeden Caffrey, kendini hapse ya da olume geri dondurmek isteyenlerle kedi fare oyunu oynarken bulur.

programme.title: The Resident
programme.desc: The Resident, ulkenin dort bir yanındaki hastanelerde hem iyi hem kotu olmak uzere gerçekte olanları açığa çıkarmak için olayların perdesini aralar. Chastain Hastanesinde her gun kişisel ve mesleki zorluklarla karşı karşıya kalan bir grup doktorun başından geçenleri anlatır.

programme.title: How i Met Your Mother
programme.desc: How I Met Your Mother, Ted (Josh Radnor) ve nasıl aşık olduğu ile ilgili bir komedi. Her şey Ted’in en yakın arkadaşı Marshall’ın (Jason Segel) uzun suredir birlikte olduğu anaokulu oğretmeni kız arkadaşı Lily’e (Alsyson Hannigan) evlenme teklif etmeye karar vermesiyle başlıyor. Gerçek aşkı bulmayı umut eden Ted’e, tescilli bekar arkadaşı Barney (Neil Patrick Harris), çılgın ve arsız yontemleriyle, kadınlarla tanıştırarak yardımcı olmaya çalışıyor. Ted, Robin (Cobie Smulders) ile tanışıyor ve bunun ilk goruşte aşık olduğuna oldukça emin. Fakat kaderin Ted için farklı planları var.

programme.title: Under the Bridge
programme.desc: 1979da Suman ve Manjit birbirlerine aşık olurlar ve bir dizi olay başlar.

programme.title: Tracker
programme.desc: Justin Hartley, TRACKERda hayatta kalma uzmanı Yalnız Kurt Colter Shaw roluyle geri donuyor. Geçen sezonun bomba gibi finalinin ardından ailesinin geçmişiyle ilgili sarsıcı gerçeklerle yuzleşen Colter, artık geçmişi geride bırakmak zorunda. Guvendiği ekibinin de yardımıyla en iyi yaptığı şeye odaklanıyor: İçgudulerini ve hayatta kalma becerilerini kullanarak kayıpları bulup odulleri toplamak.

programme.title: Anlatan Adamlar
programme.desc: Anlatan Adamlar, otomotiv teknolojileri ve muhendislik konularını anlaşılır ve detaylı şekilde anlatıyor.

programme.title: Meaty Cheesy
programme.desc: Meaty Cheesy et pişirme teknikleri, mangal kulturu ve gurme yemek tarifleri uzerine odaklanıyor.

programme.title: Restomaniac
programme.desc: Restomaniac, eski eşyaları tamir edip kullanılabilir hale getiriyor.

programme.title: Uzman Anlatıyor
programme.desc: Uzman Anlatıyor serimizde birbirinden değerli isimleri konuk aldığımız Turkiye ve dunya haberleri, sağlık ve kariyer konularında ozel roportajlar yer almaktadır.

programme.title: Fuat Diri
programme.desc: Farklı ulkeleri gezip deneyimliyor.

programme.title: Diksiyon Tv
programme.desc: Diksiyon TV - Mennan Şahin, diksiyon eğitimi almak isteyenleri evde yapabilecek egzersizler ile geliştiriyor.

programme.title: Aktifizyo
programme.desc: Aktifizyo, fiziksel sağlık ve egzersizler konusunda pratik ve bilgilendirici içerikler sunuyor.

programme.title: Vapor 03
programme.desc: Vapor 03, seramik ve el sanatları odaklı içerikler uretiyor.

programme.title: Ayşegul Örgu Hobi
programme.desc: Ayşegul Örgu Hobi, ozellikle yeni başlayanlar için kolay ve şık orgu modelleri anlatıyor.

programme.title: Clean Up 1991
programme.desc: Clean Up 1991, terkedilmiş alanların temizliği ve çevre bilincini artırmaya odaklanıyor.

programme.title: Herodot
programme.desc: Herodot, antik tarih ve mitoloji uzerine belgeseller paylaşıyor.

programme.title: Seyyarhane
programme.desc: Seyyarhane, karavan yaşamı ve doğayla iç içe seyahat deneyimlerini paylaşıyor,

programme.title: Uzman Anlatıyor
programme.desc: Uzman Anlatıyor serimizde birbirinden değerli isimleri konuk aldığımız Turkiye ve dunya haberleri, sağlık ve kariyer konularında ozel roportajlar yer almaktadır.

programme.title: Envanter
programme.desc: Envanter serimiz Turkiye ve dunya ulkelerinin onde gelen hava, kara ve deniz envanterini konu almaktadır.

programme.title: Editor Anlatıyor
programme.desc: Editor Anlatıyor serimizde editorlerimiz tarafından hazırlanan; Turkiye ve dunya haberlerini konu alan ozel içerikler yer almaktaktadır.

programme.title: Modern Ordular
programme.desc: Modern Ordular serimiz dunyanın en guçlu ordularını keşfetmeye yonelik içeriklerdir.

programme.title: Alfa
programme.desc: Alfa, ilham veren ve bilgi birikimleriyle fark oluşturan alfa isimlerle derinlemesine sohbetler gerçekleştiriyoruz.

programme.title: Faraway Village
programme.desc: Azerbaycanın Kafkas Dağlarında yer alan uzak bir koyde yaşayan bir ailenin gunluk yaşamını ve mutfak kulturunu belgeliyor.

programme.title: Solo Dağcı
programme.desc: Ben Çağan Çelik, doğa yuruyuşu ve dağcılık alanlarında diyalogsuz ve rahatlatıcı içerikler sunuyor.

programme.title: Muratca
programme.desc: MuratCA, şehir hayatını geride bırakıp kırsala goç eden ailelerin deneyimlerini, koy hayatını, doğal tarımı ve surdurulebilir yaşamlarını samimi bir şekilde paylaşıyor.

programme.title: Rotasız Seyyah
programme.desc: Rotasız Seyyah, dunya genelinde farklı yerleri gezip kulturleri, yemekleri ve doğal guzellikleri tanıtıyor.

programme.title: Kontra
programme.desc: Sporun gundemini belirleyen, takımlardan son transfer haberlerinin değerlendirildiği "Kontra" programı Haber Globalde.

programme.title: Haber Bulteni
programme.desc: Guncel, doğru, tarafsız haberleriyle Turkiyenin en guvenilir bilgi ve haber kanalı Haber Global. En guncel haberler sıcak gelişmeler Haber Bulteni Haber Global ekranlarında.

programme.title: Turkiyede Sabah
programme.desc: Turkiye ve dunyada gece yaşananlar, son dakika gelişmeleri ve geride kalan 24 saatin yeni gune taşıdıkları, haberlerle, açıklamalarla, uzmanların değerlendirmeleriyle hafta içi her gun 06.00da Elif Özkul ile "Turkiyede Sabah"ta.

programme.title: Yeni Gun
programme.desc: Ankara kulislerindeki son gelişmelerden dış haberlere, ekonomiden spor gundemine kadar gunun one çıkan başlıkları hafta içi her gun 08.00de Selver Gozuaçık ile Yeni Gunde.

programme.title: Ekonomi
programme.desc: Hafta içi her gun; Turkiye ve dunya ekonomisinden son haberler, dovizden borsaya altından bitcoine finansal piyasalarında yaşanan en sıcak gelişmeler Ekonomi Bultenleri ile ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Yeni Gun
programme.desc: Ankara kulislerindeki son gelişmelerden dış haberlere, ekonomiden spor gundemine kadar gunun one çıkan başlıkları hafta içi her gun 08.00de Selver Gozuaçık ile Yeni Gunde.

programme.title: Gundem
programme.desc: Gunun tam ortasında, haberin merkezinde Turkiye ve dunyanın gundemi Sultan Arınırın sunumuyla hafta içi her gun 12.00de "Gundem"de.

programme.title: Hava Durumu
programme.desc: Turkiyede hava durumu denince akla gelen ilk isim Bunyamin Surmeli hava durumu ile ilgili son gelişmelerle Haber Global ekranlarında.

programme.title: Gunun Nabzı
programme.desc: Haber Globalde, deneyimli televizyon habercisi Saynur Tezel, hafta içi her gun "Gunun Nabzı"nı tutuyor. Siyaset, ekonomi, diplomasi, strateji ve toplumsal gelişmelere dair bilinmesi gereken ne varsa "Gunun Nabzı"nda ekrana taşınıyor.

programme.title: Ana Haber
programme.desc: Turkiye ve Dunyada one çıkan başlıklar, son dakika ve sıcak gelişmeler, uzman konuklar, Haber Globalin deneyimli kadrosuyla hazırlanan haberler, hızlı, guvenilir ve objektif bakış açısıyla hafta içi her gun 19.00da Salih Nayman ile "Ana Haber"de.

programme.title: Mesele
programme.desc: Turkiyeyi, dunyayı etkileyen butun gelişmeler, tartışmalar, gerilimler ve çatışmalar konusunda uzman isimlerle "Hilal Özdemir ile Mesele"de değerlendiriliyor.

programme.title: Gece Ajansı

programme.desc: Minik izleyiciler için ekrana getirilen "Çizgi Film" kuşağı, eğlenceli ve renkli içerikleriyle çocuklara keyifli anlar yaşatıyor. Sevimli karakterlerin maceraları, dostluk, paylaşma, dayanışma ve hayal gucunu geliştiren hikâyelerle bir araya geliyor. Çocukların hem eğlenip hem oğrenmesini sağlayan bu ozel yayın kuşağı, ailelerin guvenle tercih edebileceği bir içerik sunuyor. "Çizgi Film", gunun farklı saatlerinde çocukların dunyasına neşe katmaya devam ediyor.

programme.title: Kan Çiçekleri
programme.desc: Kardeşini toreye kurban vermek istemeyen Baran ve tum hayallerini bir kenara koyup hiç tanımadığı biriyle evlenen Dilanın kanla yoğurulan zoraki evlilikleri Kan Çiçekleri, tekrar bolumleri ile her gun Kanal 7de!

programme.title: Poyraz Karayel
programme.desc: Aşkın ve nefretin, dostluğun ve duşmanlığın, iyiliğin ve kotuluğun en uçlarda yaşandığı bir hikaye...

programme.title: Üç Kız Kardeş
programme.desc: Turkan, Donuş ve Derya... Üç kız kardeş, anne ve babalarıyla mutlu bir hayat surerken Turkanın yaptığı evlilikle birlikte kara bulutlar ailenin ustunde gezinmeye başlayacak, artık hiçbir şey eskisi gibi olmayacaktır. Turkan, mahsur kaldığı masalsı şatoda mutsuzluğuna kılıflar dikmeye çalışırken Donuşun hayatı, geçmişten gelen buyuk sırla alt ust olacak, Derya da donuşu olmayan bir yola adım atacaktır.

programme.title: Yabancı Damat
programme.desc: Gaziantepin unlu baklavacısı Kahraman Ustanın kızı Nazlı, Ankara da universite eğitimini bitirmiş memleketine donmuştur. Nazlı yakışıklı, yabancı bir gençle tanışır. Bu genç, ailesi İstanbuldan Atinaya goç etmiş Niko adında bir Yunanlıdır. Nazlı ve Niko birbirlerine deliler gibi aşık olurlar. Ancak Nikonun ailesi Turklerden, Nazlının ailesi de Yunanlılardan pek hoşlanmamaktadır...

programme.title: Neler Oluyor Hayatta
programme.desc: Yorumlarıyla fark yaratan Hakan Ural ve Ferda Yıldırım, gundeme ve insana dair her konuya değiniyor.

programme.title: Yaprak Dokumu
programme.desc: Butun hayatını beş çocuğuna iyi bir ahlak vermeye adayan Ali Rıza Bey, bir haksızlığa goz yumması istenince kaymakamlık gorevinden istifa eder. Kızları Neclanın da universiteyi kazanmasıyla Ali Rıza Bey ve ailesi İstanbula yerleşmeye karar verir. Fakat Ali Rıza Bey, doğup buyuduğu şehri çok değişmiş bulur. Bu farklı çevrede çocukların istekleri de değişmeye başlamıştır. Buyuk şehir hayatının getirdiği ekonomik krizler kaçınılmazdır. Ali Rıza Bey, ekonomik gucuyle birlikte otoritesini de kaybetmiştir. Darbeler ardarda gelir. Ruzgar sert esmekte, ağacın yaprakları birer birer dokulmektedir...

programme.title: Gelinim Mutfakta
programme.desc: Aslı Hunelin sunumuyla ekrana gelen Gelinim Mutfakta, yine çok kazandırmaya devam ediyor. Gelinler her gun 1 çeyrek altın kazanırken, haftanın en başarılı gelini ise 10 altın bileziğin sahibi oluyor.

programme.title: Arka Sokaklar
programme.desc: İstanbul Polis Teşkilatı Asayiş Şube’de gorev yapan sivil bir ekip, minibusleriyle İstanbulun sokaklarını arşınlamakta ve karşılarına çıkan her turlu kanunsuzlukla savaşmaktadırlar.

programme.title: Kanal D Ana Haber
programme.desc: Gundemin nabzının tutulduğu ve son dakika gelişmelerinin ekrana aktarıldığı Kanal D Ana Haber, Deniz Bayramoğlu’nun sunumuyla ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Doğulu
programme.desc: Doğulu, yıllarca kaldıkları cezaevinden çıkıp, ozgurluklerine kavuştuktan sonra kendilerini zorlu bir intikam seruveninin içinde bulan Fırat Doğulu ve can yoldaşı Akının hikayesini konu ediyor.

programme.title: Doğulu
programme.desc: Doğulu, yıllarca kaldıkları cezaevinden çıkıp, ozgurluklerine kavuştuktan sonra kendilerini zorlu bir intikam seruveninin içinde bulan Fırat Doğulu ve can yoldaşı Akının hikayesini konu ediyor.

programme.title: Çiçero
programme.desc: İlyas Bazna, 2. Dunya Savaşı sırasında Ankara’daki İngiliz Buyukelçiliği’nde uşak olarak çalışmaktadır. İçeriden birçok bilgiye ulaşabilen Bazna, Almanlar için casusluk yapmaya başlar ve kendisine “Çiçero” kod adı verilir. İlyas Bazna savaşın seyrini değiştirmesine rağmen T4 uygulamasıyla engellilerin gaz odalarına gitmelerine, iğneyle uyutulmalarına engel olamaz.

programme.title: Primatların Ülkesi
programme.desc: Tanzanya kıyılarında bebek Kima, kırmızı Colobus maymunları ailesiyle birlikte yaşıyor. Peki yolunu kaybettiğinde ne olacak? Bu kuçuk maymunun ormandaki yaşama uyum sağlamayı nasıl oğrendiğini keşfedin ve ailesiyle yeniden bağlantı kurup kuramayacağını oğrenin.

programme.title: Avustralya Yılan Avcıları Ölumcul Takip
programme.desc: Çobanların olumcul yılanların evlere girmesini onlediği yeni bir banliyoye girin. Sonra Stu ve Livin doğu kahverengisini şantiyeden, Jess ve Danin bir pitonu kulubeden, Mick ile Adelein de kırmızı karınlıyı yatak odasından çıkarışlarını izleyin.

programme.title: Avustralya Yılan Avcıları Ölumcul Takip
programme.desc: Mick ve Adele ile bir kırsal arazide tehlikelere karşı koyun. İkili ofkeli bir kahverengi yılanla cesurca mucadele ediyor. Jess ve Dan bir pitonu oyun alanından çıkarırlarken dikkatli olun ve tavuk avlayan bir piton Jessin elini ezdiğinde korkun.

programme.title: Kontrolden Çıkan Yangınların Ardından
programme.desc: Yangının Avustralyanın doğal dunyasını şekillendirmedeki onemli rolunu inceleyin. 2020nin acımasız çalı yangını sezonunun bıraktığı yıkımı gezerek inceleyin; iklim değişikliğinin donum noktası niteliğindeki bu olayı nasıl koruklediğini oğrenin ve kıtadaki doğal hayatın uzun vadedeki iyileşmesini izleyin.

programme.title: Buyulu Suların Sırları
programme.desc: Yuzyıllardır folklore esin kaynağı ve yaşamla olum arasında hayati bir bağlantı yerine geçmiş bataklıkların urkunç guzelliğini keşfedin. Aç timsahlarla yuzup geyiklerin yiyecek için kendilerini riske atışını ve etçil bitkilerin avlanışını izleyin.

programme.title: Gladyatorler
programme.desc: Genç gladyatorler Amerikanın yoğun tropikal ormanlarında rutbelerini kazanırken neşelenin. Bir zehirli ok kurbağası zehirli bir yaylım ateşi başlatırken geride durun, bir jaguar ve kayman arasındaki bolge savaşını gozlemleyin ve aç bir koati ile savunmacı bir tarantulanın yollarının kesiştiğini gorun.

programme.title: Gladyatorler
programme.desc: Su yollarında yaşayan en ustun savaşçılara bir goz atmak için Amerikanın uzak kuzeyine gidin. Kartallarla balıkçılları, ayılarla başka ayıları ve yusufçuk perileriyle zehirli dev su boceklerini karşı karşıya getiren bahar erimesinin rekabeti başlatmasını izleyin.

programme.title: Alfaların Savaşı
programme.desc: Bighorn koçları dağ tepelerini sallıyor. Boz ayılar, kış için şişmanlamak istiyor. Orman tavuğu dans pistinde kuyruk tuylerini sallıyor. Vahşi aygırlar guzellik ve zarafetle gurler

programme.title: Gladyatorler
programme.desc: Genç gladyatorler Amerikanın yoğun tropikal ormanlarında rutbelerini kazanırken neşelenin. Bir zehirli ok kurbağası zehirli bir yaylım ateşi başlatırken geride durun, bir jaguar ve kayman arasındaki bolge savaşını gozlemleyin ve aç bir koati ile savunmacı bir tarantulanın yollarının kesiştiğini gorun.

programme.title: Gladyatorler
programme.desc: Su yollarında yaşayan en ustun savaşçılara bir goz atmak için Amerikanın uzak kuzeyine gidin. Kartallarla balıkçılları, ayılarla başka ayıları ve yusufçuk perileriyle zehirli dev su boceklerini karşı karşıya getiren bahar erimesinin rekabeti başlatmasını izleyin.

programme.title: Fil Olmak Retetinin Öksuzleri
programme.desc: İnsan vekil annelerin yavru filleri besleyip oyunlarla hayatta kalmayı oğrettiği ortak mulkiyetli Reteti Fil Barınağına konuk olun. Hortumsuz Longuroyu tanıyıp Kelelenin gizemli hastalığının doğaya salınmasını nasıl geciktirebileceğini oğrenin.

programme.title: Amazonda Hayatta Kalmak
programme.desc: Amazonda ne kadar ağaç bulabilirsiniz ve burada yaşamak nasıl bir şey? Golgelikler arasında seyahat edin ve 1200den fazla ağaç turunun nasıl bir arada yaşadığını gorun. Ayrıca, bu ağaçları evi addeden maymunları ve diğer canlıları takip edin.

programme.title: Amazonda Hayatta Kalmak
programme.desc: Kurak mevsim yılın en zor zamanıdır. Duşuk su seviyeleri ve alanın azalması nedeniyle, hayvanların hayatta kalmak için hızla yeni beceriler oğrenmeleri gerekir... ve bunu yapmazlarsa, yırtıcı akbabalar ziyafet için uzerlerine çullanır.

programme.title: En İyi Arkadaşım Bir Hayvan
programme.desc: Tazmanya Şeytanlarının yumuşak tarafını keşfedin, oncu bir deniz kaplumbağasıyla tanışın ve geyik Buttons ile aile yemeğinin tadını çıkarın. 800 kiloluk boğa Spud ile futbol oynayın ve baykuş Diggerın kanser tedavisi sırasında doğa koruma uzmanı Nigelı nasıl sakinleştirdiğini oğrenin.

programme.title: Afrikanın Avcıları
programme.desc: Baskın erkekler yakın bolgelerde dolaşırken, avlanma gorevi Mwamba surusunun dokuz guçlu dişi aslanına duşuyor. Yağmur mevsiminin yaklaşmasıyla ve sınırsız iştahlarıyla buyuyen altı genç yavru ile nasıl başa çıktıklarını gorun.

programme.title: Orangutan Olmak
programme.desc: Sığınaktaki orangutanlar vahşi doğaya salınmak için altı sınıftan geçerken, duygular ve buyume sancılarıyla dolu hız trenini deneyimleyin. Dillanın kaderinin aniden nasıl değiştiğini keşfedin ve koca oğlan Beninin istenmeyen bir diyete girmesini izleyin.

programme.title: Alfaların Savaşı
programme.desc: Highlandsden Alplere, Avrupa manzaraları epik vahşi yaşamın temelidir. Sabırlı kızıl geyik, azgınlık sırasında çıldırır. Kurtlar bolge için çatışıyor - - gorunduğu kadar hoş değil

programme.title: Amazonda Hayatta Kalmak
programme.desc: Amazonda ne kadar ağaç bulabilirsiniz ve burada yaşamak nasıl bir şey? Golgelikler arasında seyahat edin ve 1200den fazla ağaç turunun nasıl bir arada yaşadığını gorun. Ayrıca, bu ağaçları evi addeden maymunları ve diğer canlıları takip edin.

programme.title: Amazonda Hayatta Kalmak
programme.desc: Kurak mevsim yılın en zor zamanıdır. Duşuk su seviyeleri ve alanın azalması nedeniyle, hayvanların hayatta kalmak için hızla yeni beceriler oğrenmeleri gerekir... ve bunu yapmazlarsa, yırtıcı akbabalar ziyafet için uzerlerine çullanır.

programme.title: Gururlu Topraklar Vahşi Doğanın Yeniden Doğuşu
programme.desc: Avustralyalı bir aile Guney Afrikadaki eski bir av çiftliğini restore etme macerasına atılıyor. Amaçları, otların kapladığı habitatı yeniden inşa etmek, bir eko-turizm çiftliği kurmak ve avcılar dahil canlıların tekrar buraya gelmelerini sağlamak.

programme.title: Yeni Zelandanın En Vahşi Doğası
programme.desc: Su kenarında, cesur erkek penguenler grubu bir araya gelerek kıyıya doğru tehlikeli yolculuğa çıkmaya hazırlanıyorlar. Önlerinde duran birçok tehlikeye karşı birlikten kuvvet doğar; bu minik penguenlerin yapmaları gereken onemli bir iş var. Üreme zamanı ve dişiler gelmeden bir yuva bulmaları gerekli.

programme.title: Yeni Zelandanın En Vahşi Doğası
programme.desc: Yeni Zelandanın Batı Yakası dunyanın hiçbir yerine benzemez. Buzullarla kaplı dağlardan yağmurla sırılsıklam yerli ormanlara, çalkantılı, buz gibi denizlere kadar, inanılmaz bir doğa parçası. Dunyanın geri kalanından yalıtılmış, neredeyse el değmemiş bu bakir doğada bir dizi endemik hayvan gizli. Her biri ekolojik bir mucevher olan, evrimin kıyıda koşede kalmış ornekleri. Alp papağanlardan utangaç penguenlere, memeli benzeri kivilere ve antik yılan balıklarına kadar. Doğal hayat koşullarında sağ kalmak için canlılar dayanıklı, kurnaz ve becerikli olmalı. Batı Yakasındaki yolculuk bu arazinin guzelliğini, burada yaşayan yabani canlıların sıkıntıları ve guçluklerini sergiliyor.

programme.title: En İyi Arkadaşım Bir Hayvan
programme.desc: Meyve yarasası Banksi ve onun taşıyıcı insan annesiyle birlikte kanat çırpın, yaramaz bir devekuşu ile goz goze gelin ve bir domuzun kurtarılmasının yıldonumunu kutlayın. Deniz ineği cennetini gezin ve primat dostu Lucy ile turunun tek orneği bir akrabalığı olan Dingani ile babun dilinde konuşmayı oğrenin.

programme.title: Afrikanın Avcıları
programme.desc: Dişi aslanlar bufalo avlamak için gerekli olan erkekleri kurtarmak için yola çıktıklarında, timsah dolu bir nehri geçmek zorundadır. Mwamba surusunun tek yavrusu olan Miloyu, timsahlardan kurtulurken ve ailenin geleceğini sağlamlaştırırken izleyin.

programme.title: Amazonda Hayatta Kalmak
programme.desc: Amazonda ne kadar ağaç bulabilirsiniz ve burada yaşamak nasıl bir şey? Golgelikler arasında seyahat edin ve 1200den fazla ağaç turunun nasıl bir arada yaşadığını gorun. Ayrıca, bu ağaçları evi addeden maymunları ve diğer canlıları takip edin.

programme.title: Amazonda Hayatta Kalmak
programme.desc: Kurak mevsim yılın en zor zamanıdır. Duşuk su seviyeleri ve alanın azalması nedeniyle, hayvanların hayatta kalmak için hızla yeni beceriler oğrenmeleri gerekir... ve bunu yapmazlarsa, yırtıcı akbabalar ziyafet için uzerlerine çullanır.

programme.title: Pasifikte Doğal Hayatı Kurtarma
programme.desc: Plastik bir tuzağa yakalanan devasa bir deniz aslanını kurtarmaya çalışan veterineri ve ekibini izleyin. Ardından, limandaki bir fok yavrusunun gorme yetisini yitirme riskini taşıdığı ve bir deniz samuru yavrusunun riskli ama hayat kurtarıcı bir ameliyattan geçmesinin gerektiği Kurtarma Merkezini ziyaret edin.

programme.title: Yeni Zelandanın En Vahşi Doğası

programme.title: Yeni Zelandanın En Vahşi Doğası
programme.desc: Su kenarında, cesur erkek penguenler grubu bir araya gelerek kıyıya doğru tehlikeli yolculuğa çıkmaya hazırlanıyorlar. Önlerinde duran birçok tehlikeye karşı birlikten kuvvet doğar; bu minik penguenlerin yapmaları gereken onemli bir iş var. Üreme zamanı ve dişiler gelmeden bir yuva bulmaları gerekli.

programme.title: Yeni Zelandanın En Vahşi Doğası
programme.desc: Yeni Zelandanın Batı Yakası dunyanın hiçbir yerine benzemez. Buzullarla kaplı dağlardan yağmurla sırılsıklam yerli ormanlara, çalkantılı, buz gibi denizlere kadar, inanılmaz bir doğa parçası. Dunyanın geri kalanından yalıtılmış, neredeyse el değmemiş bu bakir doğada bir dizi endemik hayvan gizli. Her biri ekolojik bir mucevher olan, evrimin kıyıda koşede kalmış ornekleri. Alp papağanlardan utangaç penguenlere, memeli benzeri kivilere ve antik yılan balıklarına kadar. Doğal hayat koşullarında sağ kalmak için canlılar dayanıklı, kurnaz ve becerikli olmalı. Batı Yakasındaki yolculuk bu arazinin guzelliğini, burada yaşayan yabani canlıların sıkıntıları ve guçluklerini sergiliyor.

programme.title: En İyi Arkadaşım Bir Hayvan
programme.desc: Meyve yarasası Banksi ve onun taşıyıcı insan annesiyle birlikte kanat çırpın, yaramaz bir devekuşu ile goz goze gelin ve bir domuzun kurtarılmasının yıldonumunu kutlayın. Deniz ineği cennetini gezin ve primat dostu Lucy ile turunun tek orneği bir akrabalığı olan Dingani ile babun dilinde konuşmayı oğrenin.

programme.title: Afrikanın Avcıları
programme.desc: Dişi aslanlar bufalo avlamak için gerekli olan erkekleri kurtarmak için yola çıktıklarında, timsah dolu bir nehri geçmek zorundadır. Mwamba surusunun tek yavrusu olan Miloyu, timsahlardan kurtulurken ve ailenin geleceğini sağlamlaştırırken izleyin.

programme.title: Amazonda Hayatta Kalmak
programme.desc: Amazonda ne kadar ağaç bulabilirsiniz ve burada yaşamak nasıl bir şey? Golgelikler arasında seyahat edin ve 1200den fazla ağaç turunun nasıl bir arada yaşadığını gorun. Ayrıca, bu ağaçları evi addeden maymunları ve diğer canlıları takip edin.

programme.title: Amazonda Hayatta Kalmak
programme.desc: Kurak mevsim yılın en zor zamanıdır. Duşuk su seviyeleri ve alanın azalması nedeniyle, hayvanların hayatta kalmak için hızla yeni beceriler oğrenmeleri gerekir... ve bunu yapmazlarsa, yırtıcı akbabalar ziyafet için uzerlerine çullanır.

programme.title: Pasifikte Doğal Hayatı Kurtarma
programme.desc: Plastik bir tuzağa yakalanan devasa bir deniz aslanını kurtarmaya çalışan veterineri ve ekibini izleyin. Ardından, limandaki bir fok yavrusunun gorme yetisini yitirme riskini taşıdığı ve bir deniz samuru yavrusunun riskli ama hayat kurtarıcı bir ameliyattan geçmesinin gerektiği Kurtarma Merkezini ziyaret edin.

programme.title: Yeni Zelandanın En Vahşi Doğası
programme.desc: Su kenarında, cesur erkek penguenler grubu bir araya gelerek kıyıya doğru tehlikeli yolculuğa çıkmaya hazırlanıyorlar. Önlerinde duran birçok tehlikeye karşı birlikten kuvvet doğar; bu minik penguenlerin yapmaları gereken onemli bir iş var. Üreme zamanı ve dişiler gelmeden bir yuva bulmaları gerekli.

programme.title: Hızlı Ayaklar
programme.desc: Ali, normal bir okulda okurken yetenek tarama testine katılır. programme.title: Oscar Çollerde
programme.desc: Kavurucu sıcakların ortasında bir çolde Kertenkele Oscar’ın su ve yemek ararken karşılaştığı komik ve talihsiz olaylar dizisi... Tilki Popy, Sırtlan Harchi ve Akbaba Buck da aynı arayışın içinde ve çelimsiz Kertenkele Oscar’a kıyasla biraz daha guçluler.

programme.title: Sonic Boom
programme.desc: Kirpi Sonic, Miles Tails Prower, Ekidne Knuckles ve Amy Rose, Dr.Eggmanın planlarını durdurmaya çalışırken antik bir tapınak bulurlar. Sonic iyi bir şey yapacağını sanarak Lyrici serbest bırakır. Lyric Kaos Kristallerini alıp robot dunyası yapmak istemektedir. Sonic, Kristallerin bir kısmını toplar. En son Lyric dunyanın bir kısmını robotlaştırır ama Sonic ona engel olur. En sonunda Sonic Lyrici yener.

programme.title: Sonic Boom
programme.desc: Kirpi Sonic, Miles Tails Prower, Ekidne Knuckles ve Amy Rose, Dr.Eggmanın planlarını durdurmaya çalışırken antik bir tapınak bulurlar. Sonic iyi bir şey yapacağını sanarak Lyrici serbest bırakır. Lyric Kaos Kristallerini alıp robot dunyası yapmak istemektedir. Sonic, Kristallerin bir kısmını toplar. En son Lyric dunyanın bir kısmını robotlaştırır ama Sonic ona engel olur. En sonunda Sonic Lyrici yener.
